Description:
Newcomb Gem In Convenient Locale!
Set upon approx. 776m2, this property puts the elements in place for great family living! The backyard is wonderfully spacious, while the workshop will instantly appeal to tradies!
With public transport footsteps from your front door, a convenient lifestyle is part of the package. Families will appreciate that a variety of schools are within easy reach, including Newcomb Park Primary School and Geelong High School. The Garden Street shopping precinct is only moments away, while a short drive will find you at Eastern Park or in the heart of the Geelong CBD. The Portarlington Highway also grants easy access to the Bellarine Peninsula.
As soon as you step inside the front gate, you'll notice that the high front fence creates immediate privacy. The weatherboard exterior has been freshly painted, while soaring ceilings, timber floorboards, and decorative leadlight windows add character to the fresh interiors.
The formal lounge and dining room welcomes you into the home, creating a beautiful spot to either relax with a great book or entertain loved ones. The open plan living/meals/kitchen zone flows onto the spacious backyard - creating an indoor-outdoor flow that is perfect for everyday family living! The black-and-white kitchen is well equipped with a walk-in pantry, island bench/breakfast bar, and stainless steel appliances inc. a dishwasher, Westinghouse oven, and Westinghouse gas hob.
Overlooking the front garden, the Master Bedroom is graced with a built-in robe, walk-in robe, and en suite. Two additional bedrooms feature built-in robes, while the main bathroom is complete with a combined shower/bath, single vanity, and separate toilet. The laundry with storage and external access completes the layout.
Modcons include ducted heating, portable electric fireplace, split-system air conditioner, ceiling fans, and alarm system.
The private backyard is home to a garden shed and powered workshop, which is divided into two working zones. Just add a touch of TLC to the cubby house, and it will win over little ones in a heartbeat. The driveway provides ample off-street parking including a single carport and oversized single lock-up carport. Inspect without delay!
